attributes.background: Snapchat decided to update their app and everyone is complaining about it. Everybody I know has their dislikes against the app and it has also made my phone extremely slow. Everyone wants the old snapchat back.

rejection.details:
The UK Government and Parliament are not responsible for Snapchat.

You can find out more about the role of the UK Government and Parliament here: 

http://www.parliament.uk/education/about-your-parliament/what-parliament-does/
